commenter_a: Not all bills in the House of Commons or Senate passes. This is a terrible bill, one that I wish not to pass. Our national anthem is fine the way it is, and does not need changing what so ever. The Honorable Member's health decline has nothing to do with this bill, and that headline is terrible to use. You wouldn't use the word healthy on any Honorable Member in the house, then why use his health attached to the bill?
